herotext.subtext: In collaboration with reputable agencies, global employers, and authorized institutions worldwide, we offer comprehensive employment services, including assistance with visa processing and document acquisition. Additionally, we provide education and professional training tailored to the specific needs of international employers and destination countries.

logotext.subheading1: Apply for one of our current job openings or submit your CV for future career opportunities.
logotext.subheading2: Explore our professional recruitment process and let us help you find the right candidates for your business.
logotext.subheading3: Get free tax advice, a preliminary tax refund estimate, and assistance with your application.
logotext.subheading4: Stay updated with the latest job market trends, insights, and career development tips.

footer.heading: Your Success Partner
footer.headingpara: We connect top talent with leading companies, providing exceptional recruitment services that drive business success and career growth.
footer.location1: 5 Station St, London E15 1DA, United Kingdom.
footer.location3: Level 25, 108 St Georges Terrace, Perth WA 6000

candidate.cherop1: At Profi Staff, we provide personalized support at every stage of your job search
candidate.csubp1: Comprehensive support for your job search journey
candidate.citemp1: Get expert feedback to optimize your resume for better visibility
candidate.citemp2: Practice sessions and documentation guidance for success
candidate.citemp6: We'll match you with opportunities as they arise
candidate.csptialp1: We welcome proactive applications for advertised roles. If no current openings match your profile, we'll add you to our candidate database at no cost and reach out when suitable opportunities arise.
candidate.csptialp2: Our pre-interview screening ensures you only meet with employers when there's strong mutual interest.
candidate.size: Max file size: 1MB. Accepted formats: PDF, DOC, DOCX
candidate.condition: I agree that my personal data will be used for processing this inquiry in accordance with personal data protection laws. I understand my data will be stored electronically and that I may withdraw my consent at any time by submitting a written request. I also agree to be contacted by Profi Staff representatives via email or phone (including automated systems) for marketing purposes.

services.sherop: We deliver tailored workforce solutions to meet your business needs across all industries.
services.sp1: Profi Staff is a specialized employment and temporary employment agency. Thanks to the numerous organizations we cooperate with and detailed labor market research, we can greatly facilitate your search for employment abroad and in Croatia.
services.sp2: As an employment agency, we have a wide network of business contacts and have information about numerous positions that are not published anywhere. We will help our candidates with obtaining work permits and visas. And for those who have experience abroad, we will also apply for a tax refund.
services.sp3: We provide useful business advice on writing a resume and behaving at a job interview. We organize training and education for potential candidates in accordance with the requirements and needs of individual countries and employers.
services.sp4: Furthermore, we provide a professional, efficient and flexible outsourcing service, tailored to each client, we research the labor market and offer comprehensive administrative services
services.cardp1: We cooperate actively with the employer during the entire selection and recruitment procedure and adapt to specific requirements as they occur.We monitor and advise workers from the moment of their application to their arrival at the workplace.
services.cardp2: We are registered for carrying out temporary employment services and also offer a temp service by providing the workers employed at our Agency for temporary job assignments in a Client’s company. We conclude contracts with a Client for temporary employment services services in accordance with the Labour Act and we conclude the Employment Contract for Temporary Job Assignment with workers and send them to Clients who have sought our services. The temporary workers work under supervision of our Client and in accordance with the Client’s work processes.
services.cardp3: We provide in a single place a professional, high-quality and flexible outsourcing service, tailored to each client. OUTSOURCING is the delegating of a process within a company's business to third parties or external partners (agencies), with the effects and creation of benefits such as a cheaper labour force, better quality products or services, right up to introducing innovation into existing business processes.
services.cardp4: In cooperation with embassies, consulates, relevant ministries and institutions as well as all relevant government bodies, we obtain the necessary documents for residence and work abroad. Furthermore, we obtain work permits and residence visas for foreign nationals in the Republic of Croatia.
services.cardp5: Our company Concessum Business Consulting Ltd. has extensive experience in tax refunds. We cooperate successfully with more than 130 authorised partners worldwide. We send the tax refund applications in most European countries, the United States and Canada. If you work abroad, you can possibly get a tax return on your income of up to 100% of the amount taxed.
services.cardp6: When necessary, we organise education and training for workers and/or employers. Education may include preparation for passing an internationally recognised certificate of competency in a language or a profession in general, as well as additional training required for satisfactory performance of work-related tasks.
services.cardp7: The administrative services we offer include payroll services and HR management, while adhering to full confidentiality of all data processed. The payroll service is recommended in cases when in a company there are no restrictions on the recruitment of new workers, there is a high turnover of workers or simply desire to reduce administration costs.
services.cardp8: Years of experience has led us to the conclusion that monitoring and forecasting the labour market, is the result of a dynamic interrelationship of various factors which every company has to take into account when planning its activities and strategy for improving competitiveness and the position of the company.

serviceDetailes.sdpa1: We actively collaborate with the employer throughout the entire selection and recruitment process, adjusting to specific staffing requirements as they arise.
serviceDetailes.sdpa2: We define the ideal candidate profile in cooperation with the employer and handle all recruitment and selection tasks, which include:
serviceDetailes.sdal1: Identifying the most qualified and suitable workers for your company
serviceDetailes.sdal2: Conducting the full selection and hiring process on your behalf
serviceDetailes.sdal3: We assist you in getting the optimal worker in the shortest possible time.
serviceDetailes.sdal4: Ensuring every candidate completes multiple screening stages
serviceDetailes.sdal5: Collecting and verifying all necessary employment documentation
serviceDetailes.sdal8: Organizing several interviews with potential candidates
serviceDetailes.sdalp2: If required, we can also arrange specific job-related assessments to ensure safe and effective job performance, and organize additional training for individual workers or groups.
serviceDetailes.sdpa3: We support and guide each candidate from the application stage to their departure for the workplace. The Agency carries out the following actions for the job seeker:
serviceDetailes.sdal9: Applying for the chosen job vacancy
serviceDetailes.sdal10: Collecting and reviewing all application documents
serviceDetailes.sdal11: Providing guidance on interviews and required documentation
serviceDetailes.sdal12: Offering advice on working conditions and living abroad
serviceDetailes.sdal15: Communicating with the employer on your behalf
serviceDetailes.sdal16: Assisting with departure and relocation arrangements
serviceDetailes.sdpb1: We are officially registered to provide temporary employment services, offering the assignment of agency workers to perform temporary roles within the User’s company.
serviceDetailes.sdpb2: We sign a formal contract with the client (User) for the assignment of workers in accordance with the Labor Act, and we also establish an employment contract with each worker for the temporary role. These outsourced employees are then directed to the User’s workplace, where they operate under the User’s supervision and follow their internal workflow and procedures.
serviceDetailes.sdpb3l1: Full recruitment and selection of candidates based on the User’s needs
serviceDetailes.sdpb3l2: Or the employment of pre-selected workers chosen by the User for specific tasks
serviceDetailes.sdlhb1: Why Choose Our Temporary Employment Service?
serviceDetailes.sdbl1: Benefit from the support of an experienced staffing agency with a strong track record across the EU and international markets
serviceDetailes.sdbl2: A fast and reliable hiring solution for both individuals and larger groups
serviceDetailes.sdbl3: Full assistance with obtaining work permits and employment visas for jobs abroad
serviceDetailes.sdbl4: Compliance with labor laws and high professional standards guaranteed
serviceDetailes.sdbl5: Financially stable agency with a reputation for reliability
serviceDetailes.sdbl6: Complete HR administration management, so you can focus on core operations
serviceDetailes.sdbl7: Efficient coverage for sick leave, maternity leave, or seasonal staff shortages
serviceDetailes.sdbl8: Hire specialized professionals for short-term or project-based needs
serviceDetailes.sdbl9: Flexible options for fixed-term or permanent employment
serviceDetailes.sdpc1: In one place, we offer a high-quality, professional, and flexible outsourcing service designed to meet the unique needs of each client.
serviceDetailes.sdpc2: Outsourcing involves transferring certain business processes to a third-party provider or external agency, resulting in a range of benefits including cost-effective labor, improved product or service quality, and even the introduction of innovative practices into existing workflows.
serviceDetailes.sdpc3: When these services are handled across national borders and managed by a local provider, the process is known as offshore outsourcing.
serviceDetailes.sdpc4: One of the greatest advantages of outsourcing is its direct positive impact on company profitability.
serviceDetailes.sdlhc1: Why Companies Choose Outsourcing: Key Benefits
serviceDetailes.sdcl1: Reduced operational and labor costs, which lead to greater revenue and measurable savings.
serviceDetailes.sdcl2: Enhanced focus on core business functions by delegating time-consuming daily tasks to reliable partners.
serviceDetailes.sdcl3: Access to global talent and expertise, staying aligned with international trends and standards.
serviceDetailes.sdcl4: Ability to source specialized skills or resources that are unavailable in-house.
serviceDetailes.sdcl5: Delegating complex or difficult-to-manage tasks allows for better workflow control and reduced internal stress.
serviceDetailes.sdcl6: Risk mitigation, especially through offshore outsourcing, by diversifying operations and responsibilities.
serviceDetailes.sdcl7: Market expansion and closer connection to end users through localized service delivery.
serviceDetailes.sdcl8: Efficient use of internal resources, freeing up teams for higher-value activities.
serviceDetailes.sdpd1: In cooperation with embassies, consulates, competent ministries and institutions, and all relevant state bodies, we obtain the necessary documentation for residence and work abroad.
serviceDetailes.sdpd2: We also assist with acquiring work permits and residence visas for foreign citizens within Europe.
serviceDetailes.sdpd3: With years of experience, we are able to efficiently secure the required documents for work and residence in any country worldwide, ensuring the shortest processing time.
serviceDetailes.sdpd4: For foreign citizens, and in compliance with European laws and regulations, we handle the processing of residence and work permits necessary for legal employment and residence within Europe.
serviceDetailes.sdpe1: At Profi Staff Business Consulting doo, we have extensive experience in handling tax refunds. We successfully collaborate with authorized partners globally.
serviceDetailes.sdpe2: We help you apply for income tax refunds from a wide range of regions. If you’ve worked abroad, you could be eligible for a refund of up to 100% of your paid taxes. Our company offers a complete and professional service, ensuring your refund is deposited directly into your account.
serviceDetailes.sdlhe1: Why Choose Our Tax Refund Service?
serviceDetailes.sdel1: Our extensive experience in tax refund processing ensures a high success rate, with a proven track record.
serviceDetailes.sdel2: We prioritize your privacy and are committed to safeguarding your personal data.
serviceDetailes.sdel3: Using the latest technologies, we provide a highly competitive service that streamlines the refund process.
serviceDetailes.sdel4: We offer transparent pricing, ranging from 30 to 150 euros, based on the refund amount. Before you commit, you’ll receive a free preliminary calculation of your refund.
serviceDetailes.sdpf1: We organize education and training programs for employees and/or employers as needed.
serviceDetailes.sdpf2: Our training services include preparation for internationally recognized certifications in language proficiency and professional skills, as well as additional training necessary for effective job performance.
serviceDetailes.sdhpf1: In collaboration with trusted foreign language schools, we organize courses tailored to the needs of individuals preparing to work abroad or for immigration purposes within Europe.
serviceDetailes.sdhpf2: The IELTS (International English Language Testing System) is one of the leading tests used globally to assess English language skills. Created by the University of Cambridge, IELTS evaluates your level of English proficiency, allowing you to use the acquired knowledge for work or study opportunities across Europe. Passing the IELTS test is required for immigration to several regions, and the results are widely accepted by employers, immigration authorities, professional bodies, and universities. Profi Staff offers specialized courses designed to provide all the necessary materials and preparation to help you pass the test with success. There are two types of IELTS tests: 'IELTS General Training – for employment and immigration purposes', 'IELTS Academic – for study and joining professional organizations', The test includes four sections: Listening, Reading, Writing, and Speaking. The IELTS test is conducted exclusively by the British Council. You can take the test at their official center: ielts.britishcouncil.org. For further details, visit the official website: www.britishcouncil.hr/hr/exams/ielts.
serviceDetailes.sdhpf3: We offer a variety of course formats: Standard courses, Intensive courses, Weekend classes, Individual lessons. Classes are available for both groups and individuals, customized to meet specific needs.
serviceDetailes.sdpg1: At Profi Staff, we provide professional payroll and HR administration services with full confidentiality and precision. Our administrative outsourcing solutions are ideal for companies facing hiring restrictions, high employee turnover, or those aiming to streamline operations and reduce internal administrative costs. By outsourcing your payroll management, you not only simplify your accounting but also free up valuable time and resources to focus on your core business activities.
serviceDetailes.sdlg2: Calculation of bonuses, allowances, and employee benefits
serviceDetailes.sdlg3: Timely execution of services according to agreed schedules
serviceDetailes.sdlg4: Issuance of payslips and all necessary employee documentation
serviceDetailes.sdlg5: Annual income tax calculation and report preparation for relevant institutions
serviceDetailes.sdlg6: Custom report generation based on your specific requirements
serviceDetailes.sdpg2: We offer full or partial outsourcing of HR administration, tailored to suit your company’s size and structure.
serviceDetailes.sdlga1: Professional management of employee records and document archiving
serviceDetailes.sdlga2: Employee registration and de-registration with relevant authorities
serviceDetailes.sdlga4: Maintaining required documentation for the registration of foreign employees for work and residence permits
serviceDetailes.sdphp1: At Profi Staff, we understand that effective labor market analysis is essential for businesses aiming to remain competitive and strategically positioned in an ever-evolving economic environment.
serviceDetailes.sdphp2: Our labor market research services help companies track employment trends, understand workforce dynamics, and forecast hiring needs. With years of hands-on experience, we know that the key to a strong business strategy lies in aligning your human resource planning with real-time market shifts.
serviceDetailes.sdphl1: The labor market plays a crucial role in securing and retaining qualified talent.
serviceDetailes.sdphl2: Dynamic changes in the employment landscape demand ongoing monitoring and adaptability.
serviceDetailes.sdphl3: Companies must respond quickly to new forms of employment and workforce trends to remain agile and competitive.
serviceDetailes.sdphl4: Global expansion introduces complex challenges—understanding local market conditions is vital for success.
serviceDetailes.sdphl6: Tailored workforce research based on your industry and region
serviceDetailes.sdphl7: Strategic insights to guide HR planning and recruitment.
serviceDetailes.sdphl8: Support for business expansion into new markets through data-driven workforce intelligence We collaborate with clients to deliver focused research that supports smarter decision-making and long-term growth.

careers.cherop: Essential tips to perfect your CV, ace interviews, and stand out in today's competitive job market
careers.cp1: A well-written document can increase your chances of progressing in the procedure, whereas, equally so, a poorly written CV can disqualify you and eliminate your chances of personally presenting yourself to an employer.
careers.cp2: Attending an interview is a stressful event for any candidate, but good preparation can make it easier. Attention should also be directed to one’s physical appearance, which should not be too casual or untidy, but must give the impression of business maturity and decency. Furthermore, be careful that the place where you will have the interview is quiet and orderly.
careers.cp3: In today's market, employers expect workers, in addition to meeting the minimum requirements of professional education and work experience, to show some more initiative.
careers.cp4: New researches show that employers take only 6 seconds to read through your resume. Overloaded inboxes and fast modern lifestyle demands short, clear and concise information. It’s no wonder that cover letters are getting old fashioned.
careers.cap1: A CV or resume is a document that introduces you to a potential employer.
careers.cap2: A well-written document can increase your chances of progressing in the procedure, while a poorly written CV can disqualify you and take away your chance to personally introduce yourself to an employer.
careers.cahl1: Some general rules for a good CV are:
careers.cal1: Document length 1 - 2 pages, 3 for highly educated people
careers.cal2: Attractive but business-like font: Arial or Calibri
careers.cal3: Business text formatting: 2 - 3 font sizes, in black
careers.cal4: Work experience and education described chronologically and in periods
careers.cal7: A specific description of the knowledge and skills that are related to the position you are applying for
careers.cal8: Description of work methods for some specific occupations
careers.cal9: Omit or shorten information that is not relevant.
careers.cal10: Omit the image unless specifically requested in the ad
careers.cal11: Omit all discriminatory information (e.g. race and religion)
careers.cal12: You can specify gender and age.
careers.cal13: Be sure to leave contact information
careers.cbp1: Attending an interview is a stressful event for any candidate, but good preparation can make it easier.
careers.cbp2: Attention should also be directed to one’s physical appearance, which should not be too casual or untidy, but must give the impression of business maturity and decency. Furthermore, be careful that the place where you will have the interview is quiet and orderly.
careers.cbp3: Before attending an interview, preparations should usually be made for two types of questions: personal and professional Personal questions are more of a general nature, whereas professional questions are more detailed and professional. If you did not understand a question, ask the interviewer nicely to repeat the question, reformulate it or to speak more slowly.
careers.cbl3: Study your work experience in your CV extensively.
careers.cbl5: Expect and prepare for answers to 2 - 3 sub-questions on each item that you noted in the document.
careers.cbl6: The employer will probably require you to provide a detailed description of the work methods.
careers.cblh3: Advice for asking the employer questions:
careers.cbl8: It is a good idea to ask questions about anything relating directly to the undertaking of job obligations, work methods, job induction and the like.
careers.ccp1: In today's market, employers expect workers, in addition to meeting the minimum requirements of professional education and work experience, to show some more initiative.
careers.cclh1: You will definitely make a good impression, if you:
careers.ccl1: Stay up-to-date with trends in your profession
careers.ccl2: Stay up-to-date with technological and technical advances
careers.ccl3: Update your knowledge and skills through additional professional training and education
careers.ccl4: Volunteer in your profession, especially if you are unemployed or just got your diploma
careers.ccl5: Volunteer in organisations whose aims are the common good and for the wider community
careers.ccl7: Improve your proficiency in foreign languages
careers.ccp2: Profi Staff Ltd. Recruitment and Profi Staff Business Consulting Ltd. are agencies specialised for recruitment and consulting individuals and companies in Croatia and abroad.
careers.ccp3: In conjunction with verified agencies, employers and government bodies throughout the world, we provide all kinds of services relating to employment and the acquiring of all types of visas and documents. We organise training and education for potential clients in accordance with the requirements and needs of individual countries and employers.
careers.cdp1: New researches show that employers take only 6 seconds to read through your resume. Overloaded inboxes and fast modern lifestyle demands short, clear and concise information. It’s no wonder that cover letters are getting old fashioned.
careers.cdp2: Unfortunately, cover letters provided a great opportunity for a job seeker to highlights his or hers advantages, the ones that can’t be found in a resume. Today, if you want to be noticed, you need to work on your resume. We prepared a few simple tricks that will help you shine in your resume.
careers.cdl1: Add a few sentences, at the beginning, highlighting your professional competencies, career focus and what makes you different from others
careers.cdl2: Add hobbies, volunteer experience, relevant club memberships and other activities
careers.cdl3: Employer will get a better insight in your personality
careers.cdl4: Add at the end of your resume
careers.cdl5: Add bullets under your job history and description
careers.cdl7: Be specific, indicate what exactly has been achieved thanks to your efforts
careers.cdl8: Add links to your social networks: Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn etc.
careers.cdl9: Be careful what you post, your employer will surely check your profile

abouts.aherop1: Delivering exceptional recruitment solutions with a human touch.
abouts.mtext: Constant improvement of vocational, legal and organisational operations will contribute to creating greater value for the individual and wider community.
abouts.vtext: To become a key centre for job placement and recruitment forindividuals and companies throughout the world. To be a recognised partner, known for the quality of service and responsible corporate behaviour.
abouts.astoryp: How we became a trusted name in recruitment
abouts.asincep1: Founded with a vision to transform the recruitment industry, our company has grown from a small local agency to an international recruitment partner serving clients across multiple industries and countries.
abouts.asincep2: Over the years, we've consistently adapted to market changes while maintaining our commitment to ethical recruitment practices and personalized service.
abouts.avlauep: The principles that guide everything we do
abouts.avaluelistp1: We build trust through transparency and ethical practices in all our relationships.
abouts.avaluelistp2: We strive for the highest standards in service delivery and outcomes.
abouts.avaluelistp3: We believe in the power of teamwork and partnership to achieve success.
abouts.aaproch1: Want to learn more about our approach?
abouts.aaprochp1: Get in touch with our team to discuss how we can support your hiring needs.

faqs.fp1: The service for job seekers looking for work is completely free, as well as counselling during the actual procedure. The costs are borne by the employer.
faqs.fp2: Services that may be charged are: translation of documents into a foreign language, writing a CV, organising transportation, foreign language testing, organisation of education and training courses and tax return applications.
faqs.fh3: 3. IS KNOWLEDGE OF A FOREIGN LANGUAGE MANDATORY?
faqs.fp3: Ideally, the employee will speak the language of the country where he or she wants to work. For the case where it involves a rare language, English is sufficient. However, workers are expected to begin learning the language of the country where they are working, especially if employed is for an indefinite period.
faqs.fh4: 4. WHO PAYS TRAVEL EXPENSES AND ACCOMMODATION?
faqs.fp4: In practice, all options are possible. There are cases when the employer pays for travel expenses in advance, or when the worker pays travel expenses and is subsequently refunded by the employer, or when the employer expects the worker to cover all the costs. Accommodation costs are covered by employer sometimes, but usually this is an exception, as for specific professions. The employer may subsidise the accommodation costs for the first month, but most often of workers are expected to cover the costs.
faqs.fh5: 5. WHO ORGANISES THE WORK PERMITS AND VISAS?
faqs.fp5: The documents are organised by the employer or agency in cooperation with the employer.
faqs.fp6: It is required only in special situations when sought by the employer, and for the purpose of successfully and safely performing work tasks.
faqs.fh7: 7. IS A NECESSARY TO OBTAIN A POLICE CERTIFICATE OR A CERTIFICATE OF NO CRIMINAL RECORD IN ADVANCE?
faqs.fp7: This is usually not necessary for EU countries, but for overseas destinations, the employer may seek such documents, especially if required in the job description.
faqs.fh8: 8. IS IT NECESSARY TO TRANSLATE DOCUMENTS INTO FOREIGN LANGUAGES AND HAVE THEM VERIFIED BY A COURT INTERPRETER?
faqs.fp8: Yes, documents have to be translated into a foreign language. However, they do not have to be translated in advance, but at the request of the employer.
faqs.fh9: 9. WHAT ARE THE MOST COMMON DOCUMENTS REQUIRED?
faqs.fp9: A passport valid for at least 6 months, or an identity card for EU countries, professional diplomas, training certificates, employment contracts as evidence of previous employment, recommendations from past employers and a CV in English or the language of the country in which one is applying.
faqs.fh10: 10. CAN A WORKER CLAIM A TAX REFUND?
faqs.fp10: An employee may get a tax return if fulfilling all the legal requirements of the country in which the employee worked and thus qualified for a tax refund.
faqs.fh11: 11. DOES THE AGENCY TAKE A PERCENTAGE OF A WORKER’S SALARY IF THE WORKER IS EMPLOYED AS A POSTED WORKER FOR THE AGENCY?
faqs.fp11: Our agency does not take a percentage for agency services involving sending posted workers to a client. The price for the agency services is defined by an agreement between the Agency and the Client with the Client paying the fee is full.
faqs.fh12: 12. HOW TO GAIN WORK WITH OUR AGENCY?
faqs.fp12: Send us your CV, which we will evaluate. If currently we have no open positions conforming to your qualifications, we will archive the document and contact you when a position matching your work experience and education will become open.
faqs.feedback: THESE ANSWERS ARE GENERAL AND EACH PARTICULAR OFFER MAY BE ACCOMPANIED BY DIFFERENT CONDITIONS.

clients.cherop: At Profi Staff, we specialize in connecting European employers with top-tier talent across industries.

clients.csubp2: Our comprehensive recruitment partnership goes beyond traditional hiring to deliver complete workforce solutions tailored to your business needs.

clients.cservicehlistp3: Complete payroll processing and administrative support to streamline your operations.
clients.cservicehlistp4: Visa and work permit assistance for international hiring needs.
clients.cservicehlistp5: Labor market research and compensation benchmarking to inform your talent strategy.
